data.text:
Bizarro uses a Bizarro Ray to turn the Superfriends into Bizarros.Revenge of Bizarro is an episode of season 5 of Super Friends. It premiered on November 1, 1980.

Synopsis for "Revenge of Bizzaro"

Bizarro uses a Bizarro Ray to turn the Superfriends into Bizarros.

Appearing in "Revenge of Bizzaro"

Featured Characters:

Super Friends (All but Superman temporarily transformed into Bizarros in this episode)

Batman

Hawkgirl

Hawkman

Robin

Superman

Wonder Woman

Supporting Characters:

Antagonists:

Bizarro

Other Characters:

Bizarros

Lois Lane (Mentioned only)

Locations:

Bizarro World

Earth

Arctic Circle

Fortress of Solitude

Gotham City

Metropolis

Hall of Justice

Items:

Anti-Bizarro Ray

Batarangs

Bizarro Ray

Blue Kryptonite

Lasso of Truth

Red Kryptonite

Vehicles:

Bat-Copter

Batplane

Wonder Woman's Invisible Plane

Notes

Bizarro's name is misspelled in the title of this episode as "Bizzaro".

Trivia

No trivia.
